00061 void CZoomView::SetDisplaySize(void)
00062 {
00063         m_displaySize.cx = FloatToInt(m_layout.cx * m_zoomFactor);
00064         m_displaySize.cy = FloatToInt(m_layout.cy * m_zoomFactor);
00065 
00066         //if (m_displaySize.cx % 2 != 0)
00067         //      m_displaySize.cx+=1;
00068         //if (m_displaySize.cy % 2 != 0)
00069         //      m_displaySize.cy+=1;
00070 
00071         CRect rectMax(CPoint(0,0),m_displaySize);
00072         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,m_displaySize,m_page,m_line);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CZoomView::SetZoomScale(float fScale)
00076 {
00077         float oldZoomFactor = m_zoomFactor;
00078         CPoint centerScrollPosition = GetCenterScrollPosition();
00079 
00080         SetZoomFactor(fScale);
00081         SetDisplaySize();
00082 
00083         int newXScrollPosition = FloatToInt((centerScrollPosition.x / oldZoomFactor) * m_zoomFactor);
00084         int newYScrollPosition = FloatToInt((centerScrollPosition.y / oldZoomFactor) * m_zoomFactor);
00085         CRect clientRect(0,0,0,0);
00086         GetClientRect(&clientRect);
00087         newXScrollPosition -= clientRect.right/2;
00088         newYScrollPosition -= clientRect.bottom/2;
00089         ScrollToPosition(CPoint(newXScrollPosition,newYScrollPosition));
00090         Invalidate(FALSE);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CZoomView::SetZoomArea(CRect zoomRect)
00094 {
00095         CRect clientRect(0,0,0,0);
00096         GetClientRect(clientRect);
00097 
00098         CRect realRect(zoomRect);
00099 //      LPtoDP(&realRect);
00100 
00101         float widthRatio = float(clientRect.Width()) / float(realRect.Width());
00102         float heightRatio = float(clientRect.Height()) / float(realRect.Height());
00103         float ratio = (widthRatio < heightRatio) ? widthRatio : heightRatio;
00104         ratio = ratio * m_zoomFactor;
00105 
00106         CPoint centerScrollPosition = CPoint(0,0);
00107         centerScrollPosition.x = zoomRect.left + zoomRect.Width() / 2;
00108         centerScrollPosition.y = zoomRect.top + zoomRect.Height() / 2;
00109         
00110         SetZoomFactor(ratio);
00111         SetDisplaySize();
00112 
00113         int newXScrollPosition = FloatToInt(centerScrollPosition.x  * m_zoomFactor);
00114         int newYScrollPosition = FloatToInt(centerScrollPosition.y  * m_zoomFactor);
00115         
00116         GetClientRect(clientRect);
00117         newXScrollPosition -= clientRect.Width()/2;
00118         newYScrollPosition -= clientRect.Height()/2;
00119         ScrollToPosition(CPoint(newXScrollPosition,newYScrollPosition));
00120 
00121         Invalidate(FALSE);
00122 }
00123 
00124 CPoint CZoomView::GetCenterScrollPosition(void)
00125 {
00126         CPoint ScrollPosition = GetScrollPosition();
00127         CRect ClientRect(0,0,0,0);
00128         GetClientRect(&ClientRect);
00129         ScrollPosition.x += ClientRect.right/2;
00130         ScrollPosition.y += ClientRect.bottom/2;
00131         return ScrollPosition;
00132 }

00134 int CZoomView::FloatToInt(float fNumber)
00135 {
00136         if (fNumber >= 0)
00137         {
00138                 fNumber += 0.5f;
00139         }
00140         else
00141         {
00142                 fNumber -= 0.5f;
00143         }
00144         return int(fNumber);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void CZoomView::SetZoomFactor(float fZoomFactor)
00148 {
00149         if (fZoomFactor <= m_minZoomFactor) 
00150                 m_zoomFactor = m_minZoomFactor;
00151         else if (fZoomFactor >= m_maxZoomFactor)
00152                 m_zoomFactor = m_maxZoomFactor;
00153         else
00154                 m_zoomFactor = fZoomFactor;
00155 }
00156 
00157 CPoint CZoomView::ClientToImage( CPoint p )
00158 {
00159         CPoint img;
00160         
00161         img.x = FloatToInt(1.0/m_zoomFactor*(p.x + this->GetScrollPosition().x));
00162         img.y = FloatToInt(1.0/m_zoomFactor*(p.y + this->GetScrollPosition().y));               
00163         return img;
00164 }
00165 
00166 CPoint CZoomView::ImageToClient( CPoint p )
00167 {
00168         CPoint client;
00169         client.x = FloatToInt(m_zoomFactor*p.x - this->GetScrollPosition().x);
00170         client.y = FloatToInt(m_zoomFactor*p.y - this->GetScrollPosition().y);  
00171         return client;
00172 }
